jenkins.plugins.openstack.compute.UserDa.name: centos-init
jenkins.plugins.openstack.compute.UserDa.content:
#!/bin/bash
# Install git, gcc and python yum install -y git gcc python
# Install docker yum install -y yum-utils yum-config-manager --add-repo "https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo" yum -y install docker-ce yum -y update
systemctl start docker gpasswd -a centos docker chmod g+rw /var/run/docker.sock
# Install Java JRE and JDK for Jenkins agent yum install -y java-1.8.0-openjdk

jenkins.plugins.openstack.compute.UserDa.name: fedora-init
jenkins.plugins.openstack.compute.UserDa.content:
#!/bin/bash
# Install git, gcc and python sudo dnf install -y git gcc python
# Install docker sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/fedora/docker-ce.repo sudo dnf config-manager --set-enabled docker-ce-stable sudo dnf makecache sudo dnf install -y docker-ce
sudo systemctl start docker sudo gpasswd -a fedora docker sudo chmod g+rw /var/run/docker.sock
# Install Java JRE and JDK for Jenkins agent sudo dnf install -y java-1.8.0-openjdk

jenkins.plugins.openstack.compute.UserDa.name: ubuntu-init
jenkins.plugins.openstack.compute.UserDa.content:
#!/bin/bash
set -x
# Stop unattended-upgrades service sudo systemctl stop unattended-upgrades sudo systemctl disable unattended-upgrades sudo pkill -f dpkg sudo pkill -f apt-get sudo rm -f /var/lib/dpkg/lock sudo rm -f /var/lib/apt/lists/lock sudo rm -f /var/cache/apt/archives/lock
# Install git, make and gcc sudo apt install -y git make gcc
# Install docker sudo apt install -y apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable" sudo apt update -y sudo apt install -y docker-ce sudo gpasswd -a ubuntu docker sudo chmod g+rw /var/run/docker.sock
# Install Java JRE and JDK for Jenkins agent sudo apt update -y sudo apt install -y openjdk-8-jre
git config --global user.email "katacontainersbot@gmail.com" git config --global user.name "Kata Containers Bot"
echo $(hostname -I | cut -d\ -f1) $(hostname) | sudo tee -a /etc/hosts
# wipe any partition on vdb device=/dev/vdb mount | grep -q $device && sudo umount $(mount | grep $device | cut -d' ' -f1) sudo dd if=/dev/zero of=$device bs=128M count=1
